TMGM Link Redirector is a simple and efficient Chrome extension designed to streamline your browsing experience by quickly redirecting the current tab to the TMGM company's main site or portal site. With just a click on the extension icon, you can choose between accessing the TMGM Main Site or the TMGM Portal, saving you time and effort.

Features:

Instantly redirects your current tab to TMGM's Main Site or Portal with one click.
Easy to use and requires minimal permissions.
Secure and reliable, utilizing remote code hosted on AWS S3.
Perfect for TMGM clients and users who need quick and seamless access to TMGM's latest resources and information.

Enhance your browsing efficiency with the TMGM Link Redirector and stay connected with TMGM effortlessly.
